project.name: revenue-management-system
project.description: RMS Version 01 (MVP) - Revenue Management System with Pricing Engine + User Management. Full-stack TypeScript.

frontend.theme: Light SaaS Pro (lavender gray #F5F7FB, white surfaces, subtle shadows)

database_schema.summary: RMS Schema designed for Multi-tenancy with RBAC User Management (V01).

tables.name: hotels
tables.description: Tenant root. Stores hotel metadata, capacity, pricing config, timezone, ladder_steps.

tables.name: users
tables.description: System users with global role (super_admin/viewer) and is_active flag.
tables.v01_changes: Added UserRole enum, is_active field, hotel_users relation

tables.name: hotel_users
tables.description: Junction table for User-Hotel many-to-many with per-hotel roles (hotel_admin/manager/viewer).

tables.name: import_jobs
tables.description: Tracks CSV/XML file uploads and processing status.

tables.name: reservations_raw
tables.description: Append-only raw booking data from PMS. Linked to ImportJob.

tables.name: daily_otb
tables.description: Fact table. Snapshots of OTB by stay_date. Built from reservations.

tables.name: features_daily
tables.description: Computed features (Pickup T30/15/7/5, Pace, Weekend, Month).

tables.name: price_recommendations
tables.description: Pricing engine outputs. Suggestions for GM.

enums.name: UserRole
enums.description: Role hierarchy: super_admin > hotel_admin > manager > viewer

api_endpoints.explained: Processes uploaded CSV, validates rows, saves to reservations_raw.
Parses Crystal Reports PMS XML format. Aggregates by ConfirmNum.
Sets active hotel via httpOnly cookie (rms_active_hotel).
List all users with hotel assignments (super_admin only).
Create new user with optional hotel assignments.
List all hotels with user counts.

features: Data Inspector Page with Build OTB, Build Features, Run Forecast buttons
Dashboard with KPI Cards, OTB Chart, Recommendations Table
Settings: Timezone, Fiscal Start Day, Ladder Config
SaaS Pro Light Theme (consistent across all pages)

roles.super_admin: Global admin - access all hotels, all features
roles.hotel_admin: Per-hotel admin - full access within assigned hotels
roles.manager: Per-hotel manager - view + some edit permissions

pages: /select-hotel - Multi-hotel picker for users with multiple assignments
components: HotelSwitcher - Dropdown in sidebar to switch active hotel
Sidebar - Updated with Admin Panel link (super_admin only)

decisions: UUIDs for all Primary Keys (SaaS scalability)
Heuristic Forecasting instead of ML for V01
Ladder Pricing Strategy with configurable presets
Use fast-xml-parser for server-side XML parsing
Light SaaS Pro theme with lavender gray (#F5F7FB) background
NextAuth.js v5 with Google OAuth for authentication
JWT-based session with user role and accessible hotels
httpOnly cookie for active hotel persistence
HotelUser junction table for many-to-many user-hotel relationships
Separate global role (User.role) and per-hotel role (HotelUser.role)

components.sidebar: fixed left-0 w-64 h-screen bg-[#204184] text-white

gotchas: DOMParser is browser-only, use fast-xml-parser for Node.js
Prisma Date comparison requires exact match - normalize to midnight
Prisma generate fails while dev server running (file lock) - restart server
PrismaClient cannot run in Edge Middleware - use API routes for DB calls
Vercel monorepo: Must set Root Directory to 'apps/web' in Project Settings
Vercel monorepo: Framework Preset must be 'Next.js', not 'Other'
TypeScript IDE may need restart after prisma generate to pick up new types
Admin pages need layout.tsx to include sidebar (app/admin/layout.tsx)

formulas.rooms_otb: SUM(num_rooms) from reservations for that stay_date
